T02D2675:132a-0: @132a * // a'arya n'i l'am ba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni bi dhi rna'a ma dh'a ra ni t'i k'a /
T02D2675:132a-2: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can
T02D2675:132a-3: gyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi 'grel pa
T02D2675:132a-4: / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2675:132a-5: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2675:132a-6: gang zhig nyon mongs skyon gyis ma gos rin chen ltar gsal ri rab lta bur brjid //
T02D2675:132a-7: 'gro la rim par ston phyir sprul pa rang byung stong gsum sreg par mdzad pa nyid //
T02D2675:132a-8: gdod nas mi rtog chos nyid ngang las snying rje'i stobs kyis zhe sdang chen por gsal //
T02D2675:132a-9: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i mdzod gyur rdo rje 'dzin pa de la phyag btsal nas //
T02D2675:132a-10: phyi dang nang gi sdug bsngal zhi mdzad rgyud rgyal gsang ba zab mo'i don //
T02D2675:132a-11: bla ma brgyud pa'i stobs las rang byung bdud rtsi'i 'od zer nges par rab rnyed nas //
T02D2675:132a-12: gang ming thog mar lag na rdo rje'i gzungs zhes kun la grags par gyur pa yi //
T02D2675:132a-13: 'grel 'di bdag nyid rnyed sogs phyir min 'gro la phan phyir gsal bar bshad par bya //
T02D2675:132a-14: de la dang po mtshan gyi don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2675:132a-15: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo
T02D2675:132a-16: rje gos sngon po can zhes bya ba smos so
T02D2675:132a-17: // de ni thugs rje'i cho 'phrul sprul pa'i sku
T02D2675:132a-18: gnod sbyin gyi gzugs brnyan klu'i snying po phyag na
T02D2675:132a-19: rdo rje'i ngo bo ste mthu stobs kyi bdag nyid
T02D2675:132a-20: // can no // de la gnod sbyin zhes bya
T02D2675:132a-21: ba ni ri rab kyi tha ma lcags ris yongs
T02D2675:132a-22: su bskor ba'i rtse na gnod sbyin gos sngon can
T02D2675:132a-23: dag gnas pa de dang rtags mthun par bstan pa'o
T02D2675:132a-24: // can no // // sde dpon chen po ni
T02D2675:132a-25: de lta bu'i rigs gnod sbyin rnams las don ye
T02D2675:132a-26: shes chen pos 'phags pa ste gzhan 'dul ba'o //
T02D2675:132a-27: lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba ni mkhyen pa
T02D2675:132a-28: lnga'i ye shes kyi rdo rje ste nyon mongs pa
T02D2675:132a-29: lnga 'joms pa'o // gos sngon po can zhes bya ba ni lus kyi rgyan yin te /
T02D2675:132a-30: des 'gro ba rnams mos pa bskyed pa'am /
T02D2675:132a-31: rngam zhing 'khor 'dul ba'i so so'i rtags bstan pa'o //
T02D2675:132a-32: sangs rgyas gang g'a'i klung bye ba phrag 'bum gyi
T02D2675:132a-33: bye ma snyed kyis rjes su gnang bzhes pa ni
T02D2675:132a-34: sprul pa'i sku dang mtshungs pa las de dag thams
T02D2675:132a-35: cad kyis gsang ba'i bdag por dbang bskur zhing bstan
T02D2675:132b-0: pa gtad pa'am / de dag gi sprul @132b pa nyid yin pa'i phyir gnang ba'o //
T02D2675:132b-1: mche ba ni ye shes dang nyon mongs pa las skyes pa'o //
T02D2675:132b-2: gtsigs pa zhes pa ni de lta bu dang mthun pa'i ste /
T02D2675:132b-3: dug can rnam par 'dul bas gdug pa 'dul ba'o //
T02D2675:132b-4: 'tsham pa zhes pa ni nyon mongs pa'i mche ba can dang 'tsham par ston pa'o //
T02D2675:132b-5: mig me mdag gi phung po 'dra ba zhes pa ni spyan gyi gzigs stangs te /
T02D2675:132b-6: spyan rtsa dmar zhing khros pa'i lta stangs kyis lta ba'i dug can 'dul bar byed pa'o //
T02D2675:132b-7: dbugs me lce ltar 'bar ba zhes pa ni dbugs
T02D2675:132b-8: tsha zhing rtsub pas kha rlangs kyi dug can 'dul
T02D2675:132b-9: bar byed pa'o // 'jigs pa'i nga ro can zhes
T02D2675:132b-10: pa ni ha ha dang h'um h'um dang phat phat
T02D2675:132b-11: kyi sgras gdug pa'i tshogs kyi nga rgyal 'joms shing
T02D2675:132b-13: de dag ni dpal gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po'i sku drag po'i rang bzhin bstan pa ste /
T02D2675:132b-15: lag dang rkang pa klu nor rgyas kyi bus brgyan
T02D2675:132b-16: pa zhes pa ni nor rgyas kyi bu mthus bkug
T02D2675:132b-17: ste / dug dang nga rgyal phrogs nas rgyan du byas pa'o //
T02D2675:132b-18: klu nag po se ral khar thogs pa zhes pa
T02D2675:132b-19: ni tshangs pa nyid la yod pa'i rtags su gyur
T02D2675:132b-20: pa de dang mthun par ma dros pa nag po'i
T02D2675:132b-21: mthu phrogs te / rgyan du byas pas grib ma'i dug can 'dul bar byed pa'o //
T02D2675:132b-22: klu dga' bo dang nye dga' bo 'bar bas rna
T02D2675:132b-23: cha byas pa zhes pa ni ngag gi dug can
T02D2675:132b-24: gyi dug phrogs te dbang du bsdus nas thal mo
T02D2675:132b-25: sbyar te ngag snyan par bstod cing snyan gyi rgyan
T02D2675:132b-26: du byas pa'o // sprul gdug pa 'bar ba rin
T02D2675:132b-27: po che'i cod pan thogs pa zhes pa ni stobs
T02D2675:132b-29: dug dang phral nas mthong ba'i dug can dbang du bsdus te /
T02D2675:132b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi rgyan dang mthun par byas pa'o //
T02D2675:132b-31: sbrul gdug pa 'bar ba za zhes pa ni 'jog
T02D2675:132b-32: po bkug ste dug dang bcas te gsol bas dran
T02D2675:132b-33: pa'i dug can 'dul bar byed pa ste /
T02D2675:132b-34: de dag gi gdul bya la de ltar ston cing klu rigs bzhi dbang du bsdu ba dang /
T02D2675:132b-35: nor dang dngos grub rim pas bsgrub pa'o //
T02D2675:132b-36: bzhin rgyas pa zhes pa ni sgra gcan 'dzin la
T02D2675:132b-37: sogs pa'i nga rgyal phrogs te 'dul bar byed pa'o
T02D2675:132b-38: // smin ma dpral bar bsdus pa zhes bya ba
T02D2675:132b-39: ni shin tu khros pa'i cha byad kyis spyir gnod
T02D2675:133a-2: khyad par du klu khro bo dag 'dul bar mdzad pa'o //
T02D2675:133a-3: ya sos ma mchu mnan pa zhes pa ni zhal gyi bye brag ste /
T02D2675:133a-5: gshin rje'i cha byad can zhes pa la /
T02D2675:133a-6: gshin rje'i cha byad ni gnag pa dang /
T02D2675:133a-7: mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa dang /
T02D2675:133a-8: mi'i rgyu ma'i phreng ba do shal du 'phyang ba /
T02D2675:133a-12: lce glog ltar 'gyur ba zhes pa ni ha ha
T02D2675:133a-13: zhes sgrogs shing lce yang dang yang du 'gyur pa
T02D2675:133a-14: ste / des ni glog dang thog la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par 'jig par byed pa'o //
T02D2675:133a-15: gsus po che sprul za ba zhes pa ni log
T02D2675:133a-16: 'dren glang po che'i gdong pa can gyi nga rgyal
T02D2675:133a-17: 'joms pa'o // sbrul za ba zhes pa ni nam mkha' lding gi dregs pa 'joms pa'o //
T02D2675:133a-18: lag pa brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs par byed pa zhes
T02D2675:133a-19: pa ni khyab 'jug la sogs pa dregs pa can
T02D2675:133a-20: thams cad skrag cing dngang par byed pa'o //
T02D2675:133a-21: klu'i rgyal po 'dab bzangs ska rags su bcings pa
T02D2675:133a-22: zhes pa ni gang gi tshe 'dab bzangs la 'khyil
T02D2675:133a-23: pa bdun yod pa de la nam mkha' lding gis
T02D2675:133a-24: drangs pa'i tshe 'khyil pa phyed dang gnyis kyis ri
T02D2675:133a-25: rab kyi rtser sleb la 'khyil pa phyed dang drug
T02D2675:133a-26: rgya mtshor lus pa de mthus bkug ste ska rags
T02D2675:133a-27: su bcings pas 'khris cig las ma byung ba ste
T02D2675:133a-28: / sku bongs kyi tshad de dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2675:133a-29: aa la la zhes sgrogs par byed pa ni drag po'i nga ro ste /
T02D2675:133a-30: gdug pa can rnams skrag par byed cing zil gyis mnan par byed pa'o //
T02D2675:133a-31: rgya mtsho'i zabs su dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong
T02D2675:133a-32: yod pas zhabs kyis pus mor phyin pa zhes pa
T02D2675:133a-33: ni sa 'og sa bla sa stengs khyab par byed
T02D2675:133a-35: de'i tshad kyi sku bstan pa ni 'bum phrag gnyis su shes par bya'o //
T02D2675:133a-36: de bas na dbang po dang nyi ma phrag pa la khur ba zhes smos te /
T02D2675:133a-37: lta ba log pa thams cad 'joms pa'i rtags su
T02D2675:133a-38: brgya byin phrag pa g-yas pa'i steng du gzhag pa
T02D2675:133a-39: dang / de lta bu'i sku de thugs rje chen
T02D2675:133a-40: pos kun du khyab pa'i rtags su phrag pa g-yon
T02D2675:133a-41: pa la nyi ma gzhag pa'o //
T02D2675:133a-42: klu thams cad rlag par byed pa zhes pa ni klu rigs bzhi'i dug phrogs te /
T02D2675:133b-0: @133b stobs rnam par 'joms shing ma rungs pa sel bar byed pa'o //
T02D2675:133b-1: gang rgyangs chen po sgrogs pas kun du 'khrug par
T02D2675:133b-2: byed pa zhes pa ni gad rgyangs ni ha ha
T02D2675:133b-3: ste / de'i nga ro drag pos bgegs dang log
T02D2675:133b-4: 'dren thams cad kyi snying kun nas 'khrug par byas
T02D2675:133b-6: gshin rje'i gzugs can zhes pa ni ya ma zhes bya ba skrag par byed pa'o //
T02D2675:133b-7: khams gsum pa 'jigs par byed pa zhes bya ba
T02D2675:133b-8: ni de lta bu'i sku de snying rje'i rang bzhin
T02D2675:133b-9: can yin yang gdug pa 'dul ba'i thabs su de
T02D2675:133b-10: ltar bstan pas khams gsum pa de lta bu la
T02D2675:133b-12: klu thams cad 'ching bar byed pa la phyag 'tshal
T02D2675:133b-13: lo zhes pa ni klu rigs pa bzhi la sogs
T02D2675:133b-14: pa'i dug phrogs te stobs 'joms shing ma rungs pa
T02D2675:133b-16: de lta bu'i sku de la kun nas 'dud cing mchod pa ni de skad smos pa yin no //
T02D2675:133b-17: de ltar mtshan nyid bstan nas gsang ba'i gsang sngags bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2675:133b-18: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang g'a'i klung
T02D2675:133b-19: gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa'i rig sngags 'di
T02D2675:133b-20: gsungs so zhes smos pa la /
T02D2675:133b-21: de nas zhes pa ni don dang rtags bstan nas zhes pa'o //
T02D2675:133b-22: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang g'a'i klung gi bye
T02D2675:133b-23: ma snyed kyis gsungs pa zhes pa ni 'das pa
T02D2675:133b-24: dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs
T02D2675:133b-25: rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang /
T02D2675:133b-27: gsung bar 'gyur ba'i rig sngags 'di nyid mchog yin
T02D2675:133b-28: pas ni sgrub pa po rnams kyis 'di brjod par
T02D2675:133b-29: bya'o zhes pa'o // rig sngags 'di gsungs so zhes
T02D2675:133b-30: pa ni gong gi thun mong ma yin pa'i sku
T02D2675:133b-31: bya'o zhes pa'o // de dmigs la / gang gis bzlas brjod byed kyang gsal ba dang ldan pas /
T02D2675:133b-32: rig sngags kyi sbyor ba la 'jug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to /
T02D2675:133b-33: rig sngags de dag kyang gang zhe na /
T02D2675:133b-34: tadya th'a zhes pa nas r'a dzny'a pa ya ti sv'ah'a zhes pa'i bar du'o //
T02D2675:133b-35: de dag gsal bar byed pa ni tadya th'a ni bshad pa'i ltas te 'di lta ste zhes pa'o //
T02D2675:133b-36: bho bho zhes pa ni bod pa'o //
T02D2675:133b-37: w'an zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D2675:133b-38: n'a ga zhes pa ni klu'o //
T02D2675:133b-39: aa dhi zhes pa ni lhag par ro //
T02D2675:133b-40: pa ta ye shes pa ni brgyad kyi bdag po'o //
T02D2675:134a-2: gang gi rgyan yin zhe na /
T02D2675:134a-3: nang gi rgyan yin zhes pa bshad pa'i phyir /
T02D2675:134a-4: n'i l'am ba ra dha ra sha r'i ram zhes pa ni gos sngon po can gyi skya'o //
T02D2675:134a-5: gang gi phyir sku ma rtogs par sngags 'byung mi srid pas sngags dang sku gnyis su med pa'o //
T02D2675:134a-6: badzra p'a ni hri da ya zhes pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i snying po ste /
T02D2675:134a-7: gang gis brjod pas bsgrub bya mngon du byed pa'o //
T02D2675:134a-8: ya:sa m'a ti kr'a m'a ti zhes pa ni sgrub
T02D2675:134a-9: pa po'i bka' 'dor zhing 'da' bar byed na zhes
T02D2675:134a-10: pa'o // autsh'a da na zhes pa ni yul gzhan du skrod par byed pa'o //
T02D2675:134a-11: bha bi shya ni shin tu gdug pa can zhes pa'o //
T02D2675:134a-12: snying po de dag gang zhe na tadya th'a zhes smos te /
T02D2675:134a-14: buddha buddha bi buddha zhes pa ni phyag na rdo rje la bos pa'o //
T02D2675:134a-15: ma h'i pr'apta zhes pa ni ma 'gor cig ces pa'o //
T02D2675:134a-16: ha ra ha ra zhes pa ni gdug pa can gyi stobs phrogs shig pa'o //
T02D2675:134a-17: gdug pa can de gang zhe na /
T02D2675:134a-18: n'a g'a n'am zhes smos te /
T02D2675:134a-19: klu rnams kyi zhes tshig gi 'brel pa'o //
T02D2675:134a-20: pra ha ra pra ha ra zhes pa ni 'od
T02D2675:134a-21: zer las byung ba'i khro bo rnams kyis rgyob cig
T02D2675:134a-22: pa'o // gang la brdeg ce na /
T02D2675:134a-23: n'a g'a n'am zhes smos te /
T02D2675:134a-24: klu la sogs pa'i stobs 'joms pa'o //
T02D2675:134a-25: tstshinda tstshinda zhes pa ni chod cig pa'o //
T02D2675:134a-27: n'a ga hri da y'a na zhes smos te /
T02D2675:134a-29: bhinda bhinda zhes pa ni choms shig pa'o //
T02D2675:134a-31: n'a ga da m'a ni zhes smos te /
T02D2675:134a-32: klu 'khyil pa rnams choms shig pa'o //
T02D2675:134a-33: bi sh'i ryantu n'a ga sha r'i ra ni zhes
T02D2675:134a-34: pa ni dug gis myos pa'i klu'i lus shin tu
T02D2675:134a-35: choms shig pa'o // bi sphot ya zhes pa ni gzhi brjid kyi stobs choms shig pa'o //
T02D2675:134a-37: n'a ga n'a ya n'a ni zhes smos te /
T02D2675:134a-39: sngags kyi mthu gzhan yang bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2675:134a-40: tadya th'a zhes pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sngags kyis sku la bskul ba'o //
T02D2675:134a-41: gang gis bskul na h'um phat ces pas thugs bskul ba'o //
T02D2675:134a-42: n'a ga pi dha ra na ya zhes pa ni klu rnams zungs shig pa'o //
T02D2675:134a-43: h'um gis dbang du bsdus nas phat kyis dug nyams par gyis shig pa'o //
T02D2675:134a-44: n'a gotsh'a d'a n'a ya phat ces pa ni gal
T02D2675:134a-45: te shin tu gdug pa'i dug gis zin pa mi
T02D2675:134a-46: gtong na gdug pa can rnams skrod pa dang rengs
T02D2675:134b-1: n'i l'am ba sa n'a ya phat ces pa ni
T02D2675:134b-2: las dang mthun pa'i gos sngon po can mngon spyod
T02D2675:134b-3: kyis shig pa'o // aa pra ti ha ta ba
T02D2675:134b-4: la pa r'a kra ma ya phat ces pa ni
T02D2675:134b-5: gang gi phyir khyod kyi thogs pa med pa'i stobs
T02D2675:134b-6: dang mthu gzhan gyis mi thub pas gdug pa'i stobs
T02D2675:134b-8: / kri t'ant'a ya phat ces pa ni srul po'i stobs phrogs shig pa'o //
T02D2675:134b-9: kri t'anta r'u p'a ya phat ces pa ni lus srul po'i stobs phrogs shig pa'o //
T02D2675:134b-10: ro sha na ya phat ces pa ni gtum po'i stobs phrogs shig pa'o //
T02D2675:134b-11: tr'a sa na ya phat ces pa ni lha ma yin gyi gdon med par gyis shig pa'o //
T02D2675:134b-12: kumbhando da n'a ya phat ces pa ni smyo byed kyis byas pa'i stobs phrogs shig pa'o //
T02D2675:134b-13: pre ta pi sh'a tsa bi n'a sha ka r'a
T02D2675:134b-14: ya phat ces pa ni yi dags dang sha za'i
T02D2675:134b-16: yaksha aa pa sm'a ra bi n'a sha ka r'a
T02D2675:134b-17: ya phat ces pa ni gnod sbyin dang brjed byed
T02D2675:134b-18: kyi tshogs skrod par byed pa'o //
T02D2675:134b-19: ha sa ha sa zhes pa ni bzhad pa tsam gyis so //
T02D2675:134b-20: dha ra dha ra zhes pa ni dran pa tsam gyis so //
T02D2675:134b-21: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya zhes pa ni gdug pa can rnams gsod par byed pa'o //
T02D2675:134b-22: n'a sha ya n'a sha ya zhes pa ni gdug pa can rnams rengs par byed pa'o //
T02D2675:134b-23: sarba bighn'ana bi n'a sha ka r'a ya phat ces
T02D2675:134b-24: pa ni gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i bgegs thams cad
T02D2675:134b-25: dbang du bsdus shing stobs phrogs nas skrod par byed
T02D2675:134b-26: pa'o // sarba sha tr'um sam gha bi n'a sha
T02D2675:134b-27: ka r'a ya phat ces pa ni dge 'dun gyi
T02D2675:134b-28: dgra thams cad stobs phrogs te rlag par byed pa'o
T02D2675:134b-29: pa'o // // n'i l'am ba ra dha ra badzra
T02D2675:134b-30: p'a ni r'adzny'a pa ya ti sv'ah'a zhes pa ni
T02D2675:134b-31: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2675:134b-32: dbang bskur ba ni phyag na rdo rje gsang sngags
T02D2675:134b-33: pa'o // // kyi sku ste / sgrub pa pos nye bar bsdus pa'o //
T02D2675:134b-34: de ltar gsang sngags kyi rim pa bshad nas /
T02D2675:134b-35: phra mo'i las kyi rim pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2675:134b-36: de'i cho ga la gnod sbyin gyi gdon gyis zin
T02D2675:134b-37: pa la ni tshul sngags kyis btab nas gtor na
T02D2675:134b-38: btang bar 'gyur ro zhes pa la /
T02D2675:134b-39: gnod sbyin gyis zin pa'i rtags ni bzhin 'jigs pa dang /
T02D2675:134b-40: kha zas lhag par za ba dang /
T02D2675:134b-43: nga ro mi snyan pa sgrogs pa dang /
T02D2675:134b-44: nad kyi zug rdu drag po'o //
T02D2675:135a-0: de la thog mar mandala byas @135a * //
T02D2675:135a-1: te 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad kyi thig btab la /
T02D2675:135a-2: rtsibs la gnod sbyin gyi sa bon bri /
T02D2675:135a-3: rtsibs mchan du 'khor lo nyid kyi sa bon bri'o //
T02D2675:135a-4: de la bu mo lo brgyad lon pa la tsandan dang /
T02D2675:135a-8: gla rtsi lnga ni dri lnga ste /
T02D2675:135a-9: chu gtsang ma dang sbyar la bu mo khrus byas
T02D2675:135a-10: nas dkon mchog gsum dang mandala gyi lha la phyag
T02D2675:135a-11: byas te / bsnyeng nas kyi sdom pa 'dzin du bcug la /
T02D2675:135a-12: rin po che'i snod thogs pas byang phyogs nas nyi ma'i rtse la chu blangs te /
T02D2675:135a-13: snod de nyid manydzi'i steng du gzhag ku shas kha brgyan la /
T02D2675:135a-14: dar sngon pos mgul pa bcings shing mandala gyi dbus su bkod la /
T02D2675:135a-15: skud pa sngon pos sprul mgo bdun pa dgod /
T02D2675:135a-17: g-yas par yungs kar blugs te rig sngags re re re re rdzogs pa dang /
T02D2675:135a-18: yungs kar re re bum par bstim mo //
T02D2675:135a-19: de ltar yungs kar 'bru re re la khro bo
T02D2675:135a-20: rdo rjes mtshon pa grangs med pas khyab par bsam
T02D2675:135a-21: mo // bdag nyid gnod sbyin gos sngon po can du bsgoms la khar chu blugs te /
T02D2675:135a-22: nad pa'i lus la kha phrus btab pa dang /
T02D2675:135a-23: khro bo rdo rje'i mtshon cha can dag gis gnod sbyin gyi gdon phral te song bar bsam mo //
T02D2675:135a-24: de nas gdon dengs pa dang bum pas nad pa'am rang la dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2675:135a-25: de nas mandala bsdus te yungs kar dang mandala gyi sa bsres pa thogs te /
T02D2675:135a-26: bdag nyid bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i ting nge 'dzin du
T02D2675:135a-27: zhugs la phyogs mtshams brgyad du gtor zhing mtshams bcad
T02D2675:135a-28: pa de ni gnod sbyin gyis zin pa'i cho gar
T02D2675:135a-29: bstan to // klu bzlog par 'dod na smyug shad
T02D2675:135a-30: kyi lcug ma'am bal po se'u'i lcug mas bya'o zhes
T02D2675:135a-31: bstan to // pa ni / thog mar nad pa'i nad brtag par bya ste /
T02D2675:135a-32: klu'i nad spyir mang na yang /
T02D2675:135a-33: nad pa klu la dga' ba dang /
T02D2675:135a-36: nad ga nur lci ba dang ;
T02D2675:135a-38: 'khrul zhing dran pa mi gsal ba dang /
T02D2675:135a-41: sna 'gag / lus dri mi zhim pa rnams klu'i nad yin no //
T02D2675:135a-42: gal te mdze gso bar 'dod na yang klu'i nad yin min rtogs par byas te gso'o //
T02D2675:135b-0: de smyag @135b shad kyi lcug ma dang /
T02D2675:135b-1: bal po se'u'i lcug brgyad pa'i gnas lngar 'bru lngas bsrungs te /
T02D2675:135b-2: nub phyogs nas lcug ma mtshar bu'i thems kyis gcad la /
T02D2675:135b-3: lcug ma bdun brngas pa dang /
T02D2675:135b-4: dngul gzhong chus bkang ba'i nang du lcug ma bcug
T02D2675:135b-5: ste gzhag /'khar gzhong cig gi nang du zan la
T02D2675:135b-6: padma 'dab ma drug pa cig byas la /
T02D2675:135b-7: de'i steng du ba su ta rigs drug dgod pa ni gcig la bu mo dang khye'u dgod /
T02D2675:135b-8: gcig la sprul kha dog 'dres pa sprul mgo bdun pa dgod /
T02D2675:135b-9: gcig la nya dang sbal pa dang lcong mo dgod /
T02D2675:135b-10: gcig la rtsangs ma mgo dgu dgod /
T02D2675:135b-12: gcig la sprul nor bu rin po ches brgyan pa dgod /
T02D2675:135b-13: de'i mtha' ma shing gis bskor la gzhag go //
T02D2675:135b-14: de nas smyag shad dang bal po se'u'i lcug ma dril te /
T02D2675:135b-15: skud pas gsum du bcings te /
T02D2675:135b-16: de la rma bya'i mdongs gsum btsugs la bdag nyid
T02D2675:135b-17: gos sngon po can du gsal bas lcug ma dang
T02D2675:135b-18: rma bya'i dril ba lag tu thogs te /
T02D2675:135b-19: nad pa sngon du bzhag la nad pa la byab cing padma dang klu la dbab /
T02D2675:135b-20: de nas dug de des khyer bar bsams la /
T02D2675:135b-21: klu rnams zla ba'i gdan la 'dug par bsams pa'i
T02D2675:135b-22: 'og tu yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgoms te
T02D2675:135b-23: ; gzungs kyi phreng ba'i mjug tu n'a ga spha
T02D2675:135b-24: ra na phat ces brjod pas klu rnams rang gi
T02D2675:135b-25: gnas gang yin par rlung gis bskyod nas skad cig
T02D2675:135b-27: de lta bu gcig gis kyang phan par nus na mang du byas na smos su med do //
T02D2675:135b-28: de ni klu'i nad gso ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D2675:135b-29: yi dags dang brjed byed rnams la ni skud pas bya'o zhes pa ni /
T02D2675:135b-30: brjed byed kyi rtags ni dran pa nyams pa dang /
T02D2675:135b-34: me dang chu dang g-yang la mchod pa dang /
T02D2675:135b-35: gnyid mang ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2675:135b-36: de la skud pa dkar po la mdud pa brgya byas te /
T02D2675:135b-37: mdud pa re re la sngags re re bzlas la /
T02D2675:135b-38: skud pa'i mtha' gnyis dbus dang gsum du zangs kyi
T02D2675:135b-39: phur pa sor gnyis pa la sngags lan nyi shu
T02D2675:135b-40: rtsa gcig bzlas pas mtshan te /
T02D2675:135b-42: rim pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2675:136a-3: yi ga 'chus pa la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o zhes pa ni /
T02D2675:136a-4: ras bal gyi skud pa me tog sngon pos kha bsgyur te /
T02D2675:136a-5: sngags tshig rnams shog bu la bris te /
T02D2675:136a-6: skud pa dang bcas mgul ba'am gang na bar btags na 'cho bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2675:136a-7: byis pa gdon gyis nyen pa dang /
T02D2675:136a-8: nad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad la skud pa sngon pos bya'o zhes pa ni /
T02D2675:136a-9: ras bal gyi skud pa me tog sngon pos kha bsgyur te /
T02D2675:136a-10: mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad dam nyi shu rtsa gcig tu mdud de /
T02D2675:136a-11: mdud pa re re zhing sngags re re rdzogs pa
T02D2675:136a-12: dang bsrung bya'i mgul lam ga shar btags nas ting
T02D2675:136a-13: nge 'dzin gyis gdon gyis nyen pa'i lus rdo rje'i
T02D2675:136a-14: dra bar bsgoms na bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro
T02D2675:136a-15: // chom rkun bzlog par 'dod na sas bya'o zhes
T02D2675:136a-16: pa ni rnal 'byor pa rang gi chag gang brkos
T02D2675:136a-17: pa'i gting nas sa rlon pa blangs te /
T02D2675:136a-18: gu gul nag pos bdugs la sngags re re zhing yungs kar re re sa la bsnun par bya'o //
T02D2675:136a-19: de ltar sngags stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang /
T02D2675:136a-20: sa de kham pa'i ga'u srubs med par blugs la /
T02D2675:136a-21: bar bu'i dkyil du bug pa smyug ma tsam cig phug ste /
T02D2675:136a-22: de'i nang du yungs kar stong la sngags stong thim pa dang /
T02D2675:136a-23: shing kha dhi ra'i sdong pos bsregs nas nang gi
T02D2675:136a-24: sa dang yungs kar tshig cing mdog 'gyur bar byas
T02D2675:136a-25: nas / de'i nang nas phyung la snod kyi nang
T02D2675:136a-26: du blugs la jag rkun byung ba'i dus su gtor
T02D2675:136a-28: khyad par du rkun po la nor rdzas gang yin
T02D2675:136a-29: pa la sngags khros pa'i shugs kyis btab na rkun
T02D2675:136a-31: dug la ni rtsa ku shas byab par bya'o zhes pa ni /
T02D2675:136a-32: gang dug gis zin pa de drug dang dbral bar 'dod pa rtsva ku sha bdag gis bzung ste /
T02D2675:136a-33: mdun du sol ba dang rdo rgyus la sbrul gyi
T02D2675:136a-34: gzugs cig byas la nad pa'i lus las dug de
T02D2675:136a-35: ku shas bya ba ste phreng ba'i sngags kyi zhabs
T02D2675:136a-36: la kham kham zhes brjod cing gzugs de la phab
T02D2675:136a-37: pas 'gul bar bsam shing gzugs kyi snying gar hr'i:
T02D2675:136a-38: las 'di byung bas nad de bsdus nas de nyid
T02D2675:136b-0: hr'i: la thim par bsam de nas gzugs @136b de
T02D2675:136b-1: gnas mthon por phyung la rlung la bskur te /
T02D2675:136b-2: nam mkha' la khyer bar bsam mo //
T02D2675:136b-3: de ni dug dbyung ba'i cho ga ste /
T02D2675:136b-4: shin tu rtse gcig dang ldan pas bya'o //
T02D2675:136b-5: nor 'dod na zhag gcig smyung bar 'dug ste /
T02D2675:136b-6: pog gis bdugs na rmi lam du dge ba dang
T02D2675:136b-7: mi dge ba'i don thams cad ston cing gser gyi
T02D2675:136b-8: dong tshe bdun stong sbyin par byed do zhes pa
T02D2675:136b-9: ni / bdag nyid gos sngon po can du bsgoms
T02D2675:136b-10: la mdun du 'phags pa dzam bha la bsams la
T02D2675:136b-11: ni / mchod do // de yang smyung bar gnas
T02D2675:136b-12: pa'i nang bar nyi ma'i rtse la chu khyor ba
T02D2675:136b-13: brgya rtsa brgyad sngags 'dis dbul lo //
T02D2675:136b-14: aom dzambha la dza lendr'a ya sv'ah'a /
T02D2675:136b-16: rgyun du phreng ba'i sngags 'di kho na brjod par bya'o //
T02D2675:136b-17: de ltar zhag bdun zhing zhag re re smyung bar gnas te /
T02D2675:136b-18: ga pur dang dz'a ti pha la dang /
T02D2675:136b-20: gur kum la sogs pa dri sna tshogs kyis gos sngon po can gyi gzugs brnyan dang /
T02D2675:136b-21: mchod rten la sogs pa'i mdun du 'dug pa dang /
T02D2675:136b-22: 'phags pa gos sngon po can yang dag par mchod
T02D2675:136b-23: cing yid la byed pas rnam thos sras la bdag
T02D2675:136b-24: dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i nor slong ngo zhes
T02D2675:136b-26: rmi lam na gser gyi dong tshe nyid mthong ba'am /
T02D2675:136b-28: gzhan gyis bdag la byin pa'am /
T02D2675:136b-29: mang po la longs spyod pa ni grub pa'i mtshan ma ste /
T02D2675:136b-30: gang dag sa'i dkyil 'khor 'di na las dang po
T02D2675:136b-31: pa'i bsod nams las grub pa'i gnod sbyin pho mo
T02D2675:136b-32: rnams kyis bdag la gter ster ba dang /
T02D2675:136b-33: sa la gnas pa'i gter dag ston par 'gyur ro //
T02D2675:136b-34: rmi lam du dong tshe bdun stong mthong na the tshom med do //
T02D2675:136b-35: sgo lcags dbye bar 'dod na yungs kar gyis bya'o zhes pa ni /
T02D2675:136b-36: bram ze'i rigs kyi thod par yungs kar blugs te
T02D2675:136b-37: phreng ba'i sngags brjod cing bsgrub pa la sogs pa
T02D2675:136b-38: / stong ngam khri la sogs pa thim pa dang yungs kar byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2675:136b-39: sgo lcags 'byed pa'i dus su yang phreng ba'i sngags
T02D2675:136b-40: brjod cing lde khung du yungs kar bdun nam nyi
T02D2675:136b-41: shu rtsa gcig bskyur bas phyed par 'gyur ro //
T02D2675:136b-42: rgyas btab pa dgrol bar 'dod na thal bas bya'o zhes pa ni /
T02D2675:137a-0: pa'i lci ba la sogs pa rnam @137a * //
T02D2675:137a-1: pa lnga sa dang sbyar la zhi ba'i hom khung du byas te /
T02D2675:137a-2: tsandan dmar po'i me btang la me tog sngon po'i
T02D2675:137a-3: nang du mngar gsum gyi ri lu bag phyer gtums
T02D2675:137a-4: te bcug la / me tog dang phreng ba'i sngags bzlas te /
T02D2675:137a-5: stong ngam khri thim par bsregs pa'i thal bas gtor ram bskus na grol bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2675:137a-6: 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung ba ni mar rnying
T02D2675:137a-7: pa'am thal ba'am yungs kar gyis bya'o zhes pa ni
T02D2675:137a-8: mar lo du ma lon pa ga'u'i nang du bcug
T02D2675:137a-9: ste / steng na bu ga byas pa la chu btang ste /
T02D2675:137a-10: phreng ba'i sngags stong ngam khri them pa dang phyag na rdo rje yang dag par mchod do //
T02D2675:137a-11: gzungs kyi bum pa dang ldan pa'i chus lus bkrus te /
T02D2675:137a-12: ga'u'i mar gyis bskus na 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2675:137a-13: yang na ga'u'i bu ga na mar yungs kar re re zhing phreng ba'i sngags re re brjod cing /
T02D2675:137a-14: de re re yang khro chung re rer gyur par bsams la /
T02D2675:137a-15: de stong ngam khri la sogs pa them pa dang /
T02D2675:137a-16: spyi bo la sogs par phur pa byas te btags
T02D2675:137a-17: na yang 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur
T02D2675:137a-18: ro // thal ba la ni zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal ba ste /
T02D2675:137a-19: mar rnying pa dang lhan cig tu gzungs sngags 'bum bzlas te byug pa'am /
T02D2675:137a-20: yang na yungs kar dang ldan pa'i byug pa'am /
T02D2675:137a-21: gdags pa byas na yang thar bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2675:137a-22: bdag bsrung ba ni yid kyis sam chus bya'o zhes pa ni /
T02D2675:137a-24: bzlas pa rdzogs pa ni dmigs pa tsam gyis so //
T02D2675:137a-25: yang na chu la bsngags te steng 'og la sogs par gtor zhing btung bar bya'o //
T02D2675:137a-26: gzhan bsrung ba ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o zhes
T02D2675:137a-27: pa ni gong du bshad pa dang sbyar bar bya'o
T02D2675:137a-28: // las de dag thams cad la sngags bzlas pa ni lan gsum mam /
T02D2675:137a-32: brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bya'o zhes pa ni gong
T02D2675:137a-33: du bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas las la
T02D2675:137a-34: sbyor ba'i dus su rig pa brjod pa'i grangs kyi
T02D2675:137a-35: tshad do // de ltar byas na 'grub par 'gyur
T02D2675:137a-36: ro zhes pa ni gong du bstan pa'i las tshogs
T02D2675:137b-0: mchod rten sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mdun du @137b
T02D2675:137b-1: me tog sngon pos mchod do zhes pa ni mchod
T02D2675:137b-2: rten bde bar gshegs pa'i gdung dang ldan pa'i rtsar
T02D2675:137b-3: phyag na rdo rje sgrub thabs las 'byung ba bzhin
T02D2675:137b-4: mchod de me tog sngon po gur kum gyi chur
T02D2675:137b-5: bcug ste / nyi ma re re la dus gsum du nyi shu rtsa gcig tu mchod par bya'o //
T02D2675:137b-6: sngags stong bzlas brjod byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes pa ni tha ma'i tshad bstan pa ste /
T02D2675:137b-7: ji srid skyo bar ma gyur gyi bar du brjod par bya'o //
T02D2675:137b-9: ras ris la sogs pa phyag na rdo rje'i sku
T02D2675:137b-10: gzugs kyi mdun du ji skad bshad pa'i sgrub thabs
T02D2675:137b-11: bzhin du yang dag par mchod de mnyes par byas
T02D2675:137b-12: nas phreng ba'i sngags 'bum mam bye ba la sogs
T02D2675:137b-13: pa'i sbyor ba sngon du song bas ni 'grub par
T02D2675:137b-14: mi 'gyur ba gang yang yod par mi 'gyur ro
T02D2675:137b-15: // sems can 'dod pa tha dad rnams la gzigs nas ni //
T02D2675:137b-16: bde bar gshegs pas byang chub lam ni snga tshogs gsungs //
T02D2675:137b-17: snyigs ma'i dus kyi sems can brtson 'grus blo zhan rnams //
T02D2675:137b-18: 'jug bya'i don du de nyid sgron ma 'di brtsams te //
T02D2675:137b-19: bla ma la gus dad ldan snying rje shes rab ldan //
T02D2675:137b-20: theg chen thabs mkhas tshad med snying rje'i sems bskyed pa //
T02D2675:137b-21: dbang rnams rdzogs shing rjes su gnang thob dam tshig can /
T02D2675:137b-22: de la dpa' bos gnang dbang brgyud de bstan par bya /
T02D2675:137b-23: bla ma mnyes byas brtse bas bdud rtsi'i 'od zer thob //
T02D2675:137b-24: ji srid mnyes byas gzhan don lhag lhas gnang ba byin //
T02D2675:137b-25: rang nyams stobs kyis sgrub po rdzas gzung rgyud don bris //
T02D2675:137b-26: ngal ba'i dge bas dngos grub rnam gnyis thob par
T02D2675:137b-27: shog /'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po
T02D2675:137b-28: can gyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi 'grel
T02D2675:137b-29: pa de kho na nyid gsal bar byed pa'i sgron
T02D2675:137b-30: ma zhes bya ba slob dpon klu grub kyis mdzad
T02D2675:137b-32: / rgya gar gyi mkhas pa d'i pam k'a ra
T02D2675:137b-33: shr'i dzny'a na dang bod kyi lo ts'a ba rgya
